book 1.title: It Ends with Us
book 1.author: Hoover, Collen
book 1.review: She loves it like one of her own children. This is a heart jerker until the very end!

book 2.title: The Silent Patient
book 2.author: Michaelides, Alex
book 2.review: A thriller that consumes you until the very last sentence, Alex Michalides knows how to keep us strapped into the story throughout all 325 pages
